meanings.sent1: The coffee grounds were too large to be filtrable through the sieve.
meanings.sent2: The tiny particles were easily filtrable through the fine mesh filter.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was so filtrable that it caught all the dust in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a filtrable light, shining through even the darkest of times.
meanings.sent5: The water was so filtrable that it left behind only pure crystals after filtration.

meanings.definition: Able to pass through a filter.
meanings.sent1: The oil was too thick to be filtrable through the paper filter.
meanings.sent2: The air was easily filtrable through the clean air filter.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur was so filtrable that it seemed to disappear through the sieve.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like filtrable whispers, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight was so filtrable that it illuminated even the tiniest of spaces after passing through the window screen.
